mapper.select: select menu_id, name, route, type, parent_id, icon, menu_order, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modifier_id, modified_time from sys_menu where menu_id = #{menu_id} and sys_status = 1

select menu_id, name, route, type, parent_id, icon, menu_order, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modifier_id, modified_time from sys_menu where sys_status = 1 order by if(isnull(modified_time),0,modified_time) desc,created_time desc
select * from sys_menu where sys_status = 1 and type = 'ROOT'
